name: iPhone 15 Pro
description: Apple A17 Pro chip সহ শক্তিশালী পারফরম্যান্স, ProMotion display এবং 48MP Triple Camera setup।

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen chipset এবং 200MP quad camera system।

name: Google Pixel 8 Pro
description: Google Tensor G3, AI-powered camera, Night Sight & Astro Photography mode সাপোর্ট করে।

name: OnePlus 12
description: 120Hz AMOLED display, Snapdragon flagship processor এবং Hasselblad টিউনড ক্যামেরা।

name: Xiaomi 14 Pro
description: Leica camera optics, flagship Snapdragon processor, এবং 120W fast charging।
